text.*:
It has been suggested that this article be split into multiple articles. (Discuss) (September 2017)

This is a partial list of 20th-century writers. This list includes notable artists, authors, philosophers, playwrights, poets, scientists and other important and noteworthy contributors to literature. Literature (from Latin litterae (plural); letters) is the art of written works. Literally translated, the word literature means "acquaintance with letters" (as in the "arts and letters"). The two most basic written literary categories include fiction and non fiction.

Contents

  • A B C D E F G H I J K L M N O P R S T U V W Y Z
